name: Forest Frenzy
description:
Shoot to survive, shoot em' up, score attack! A wave based shooter where you must buy weapons and upgrades to survive! Get local high scores or compete on steam leaderboards!
Forest Frenzy is a Unreal Engine 5 game and indie game project assembled by one person in only 2 months.

Key Features:
1. Wave based shoot em up survival
2. Next-gen UE5 graphics
3. Local high scores
4. Steam leaderboards
5. Easy, Medium, and Hard difficulties
